StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAchievedReportByType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OrgUnitID int, @FY int, @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er = null )
AS begin
declare @FYStartDt date.me declare @FYEndDt date.me select @FYStartDt = convert(date.me, cast(@FY-1 as varchar(4)) + '/10/1') --print @FYStartDt select @FYEndDt = convert(date.me, cast(@FY as varchar(4)) + '/09/30') --print @FYEndDt -- --select * into #PlanTbl from dbo.Ac.vityObjec.ve ao --where OrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID --and convert(date.me, cast(CalendarYear as varchar(4)) + '/' --+ cast(month as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FromDate and @ToDate
select * into #PlanTbl from dbo.MonthlyObjec.ve mo where (RecruiterID = @RecruiterID or (@RecruiterID is null and RecruiterID ='00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' and Organiza.onId = @OrgUnitID)) and convert(date.me, cast(year as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(month as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FromDate and @ToDate
select * into #AchTbl from dbo.RptDataAnalysis da where (RecruiterID = @RecruiterID or (@RecruiterID is null and OrgId = @OrgUnitID)) and convert(date.me, cast(analysisyear as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(analysismonth as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FromDate and @ToDate
select * into #FYAchTbl from dbo.RptDataAnalysis da where (RecruiterID = @RecruiterID or (@RecruiterID is null and OrgId = @OrgUnitID)) and convert(date.me, cast(analysisyear as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(analysismonth as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FYStartDt and @FYEndDt
CREATE TABLE #AnalysisTable ( TcActAch INT default 0, TcMade INT default 0, TcAppt INT default 0, TcInt INT default 0, TcJoin INT default 0, TcPlanned INT default 0, TCJoinFYTD INT default 0, OtActAch INT default 0, OtMade INT default 0, OtAppt INT default 0, OtInt INT default 0, OtJoin INT default 0, OtPlanned INT default 0, OtJoinFYTD INT default 0, AcActAch INT default 0, AcMade INT default 0, AcAppt INT default 0, AcInt INT default 0, AcJoin INT default 0, AcPlanned INT default 0, AcJoinFYTD INT default 0, MoActAch INT default 0, MoMade INT default 0, MoAppt INT default 0, MoInt INT default 0, MoJoin INT default 0, MoPlanned INT default 0, MoJoinFYTD INT default 0, EmActAch INT default 0, EmMade INT default 0, EmAppt INT default 0, EmInt INT default 0, EmJoin INT default 0, EmPlanned INT default 0, EmJoinFYTD INT default 0 )
insert into #AnalysisTable (TcActAch, TcMade, TcAppt, TcInt, TcJoin, OtActAch, OtMade, OtAppt, OtInt, OtJoin, AcActAch, AcMade , AcAppt , AcInt, AcJoin , MoActAch, MoMade , MoAppt , MoInt , MoJoin , EmActAch , EmMade , EmAppt, EmInt ,EmJoin)
select sum(TcActAch) TcActAch , sum(TcMade) TcMade , sum(TcAppt) TcAppt , sum(TcInt) TcInt , sum(TcJoin) TcJoin, sum(OtActAch) OtActAch, sum(OtMade) OtMade, sum(OtAppt) OtAppt, sum(OtInt) OtInt, sum(OtJoin) OtJoin, sum(AcActAch) AcActAch, sum(AcMade) AcMade , sum(AcAppt) AcAppt , sum(AcInt) AcInt, sum(AcJoin) AcJoin , sum(HvActAch) MoActAch, sum(HvMade) MoMade , sum(HvAppt) MoAppt , sum(HvInt) MoInt , sum(HvJoin) MoJoin , sum(EpActAch) EmActAch , sum(EpMade) EmMade , sum(EpAppt) EmAppt, sum(EpInt) EmInt, sum(EpJoin) EmJoin from #AchTbl
update #AnalysisTable set TcPlanned = rst.TcPlan, OtPlanned = rst.OtPlan, AcPlanned = rst.AcPlan, MoPlanned = rst.MoPlan, EmPlanned = rst.EmPlan from (select TelephoneCall TcPlan, O.ceTra.c OtPlan, AreaCanvassing AcPlan, HomeVisit MoPlan, ElectronicProspec.ng EmPlan from #PlanTbl)rst
update #AnalysisTable set TcJoinFYTD = rst.TcJoinFYTD, OtJoinFYTD = rst.OtJoinFYTD, AcJoinFYTD = rst.AcJoinFYTD, MoJoinFYTD = rst.MoJoinFYTD, EmJoinFYTD = rst.EmJoinFYTD from (select sum(TcJoin) TcJoinFYTD, sum(OtJoin) otJoinFYTD, sum(AcJoin) AcJoinFYTD, sum(HvJoin) MoJoinFYTD, sum(EpJoin) EmJoinFYTD from #FYAchTbl) rst --from
select * from #AnalysisTable
drop table #AnalysisTable drop table #AchTbl drop table #FYAchTbl drop table #PlanTbl
end
